byline.original: By JULFIKAR ALI MANIK and NIDA NAJAR
byline.contributor: Julfikar Ali Manik reported from Dhaka, and Nida Najar from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: Four men chased down Ananta Bijoy Dash near his home in the city of Sylhet, in the third fatal attack on a Bangladeshi blogger since February.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Bangladesh: A Blogger Is Killed
headline.main: Bangladeshi Blogger Who Wrote on Site Promoting Secularism Is Killed

snippet: Four men chased down Ananta Bijoy Dash near his home in the city of Sylhet, in the third fatal attack on a Bangladeshi blogger since February.
abstract: Blogger Ananta Bijoy Dash is chased and killed by four men in Bangladesh, third fatal attack on a blogger in country since February.
